title: Bloomberg Barclays U.S. Aggregate Bond Index Replication

issues.title: Bond count target range could be more precise
issues.description: '300-400 bonds' is a range - specific target or decision rule for exact count not provided
issues.suggested_fix: Consider specifying: 'Target 350 bonds, range 300-400 based on optimization results' or provide decision rule for selecting exact count

issues.title: Tracking error measurement window not specified
issues.description: 'annualized' tracking error but rolling window period not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: '15 basis points annualized calculated on 60-day rolling window' or other specific measurement period

notes: Very minor issues - essentially production-ready with tiny clarifications
